response.overview: Nagi meets a taciturn man named Goro and goes with him to a rooftop to commit a double suicide, but they decide to postpone their plan. With nowhere to go, they end up staying at a secluded cottage — but what awaits them as they pass each day without purpose and prolong the little time they have left…?
response.tagline: The much-anticipated debut pink film by newcomer Daisuke Shimomura, featuring meticulously crafted visuals and soundscapes, portrays the aimless journey of a man and a woman with nowhere to turn.
response.title: 夜に旅
